852640.name: Katie: Gratitude Pack
852640.description:
Hello there! Welcome to the Gratitude Pack!

Purchasing this will help support me, the developer of Katie, and make me very Grateful.

You also get a bunch of cool stuff, currently including:

  • 2 Live Wallpapers as executables, which are synced up to the time of day
  • The soundtrack to the game, including 10 unique songs by six artists
  • Static HD screenshots and artwork, if that's your thing
  • My everlasting appreciation

Songs Included:
  • Wandering Ideas - Josiah Kangas
  • A Free Day - Josiah Kangas
  • Fumbled Proposition - Josiah Kangas
  • Days Past - Arley
  • What Was Lost (Static Recording) - Rachel Cottle
  • City Lights (Remix) - Sonan
  • Bauble - Sonan
  • Worth It - Kena Cramer
  • The Narrator's Theme (Bonus) - Katherine Tinlin


All files can be found in the install directory of Katie, inside of the Gratitude Pack folder. It is divided into two folders: the wallpapers and the soundtrack.

*Note: The live wallpapers need a wrapper program to actually be set as wallpaper (Eg: Wallpaper Engine). However, they can still be used as normal programs and are pretty neat!
